name: FIREWALL (Del / birdpun, Sebastian Scaini)
description:
Originally designed for the Cathode Mark 1. This version has been modified to work with a regular PC. About

We have taken control of your Cathode Mark 1. You have one chance to save it. Protect your totems. If you do, you keep your computer. If you don't... Well, maybe it's best you didn't know.

Have fun.
